wikipedia_page.main: Cara Horgan (born 5 October 1984) is an English actress who has appeared on stage, on television, and in films.

response: * Cara Horgan, actress, Lewis (TV series) and Silent Witness
The play was performed at the Theatre Royal at the Bristol Old Vic from 24 May to 9 June 2010. It was directed by Simon Godwin, and starred Annette Badland, Tristan Sturrock and Cara Horgan.
